neuralnetworksimulator

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • neuralnetworksimulator.NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Reusable neural network implementation with optimization for state-reporting functionality using NNSimulatorViewController. Allows fast calculation of simple multilayer perceptron. Uses the org.apache.commons.math3.linear library
    Author:
    Najib Ghadri

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NeuralNetwork.Layer
      Perceptron layer representation
      class  NeuralNetwork.NetworkData
      Structure to exchange data with other classes
      private class  NeuralNetwork.NNWorker
      Runs the network process in a different thread than EDT.

      • startToggle

        public void startToggle()
        Start the process then pause and resume until stopped. Locks the controlPanel and executes a new NeuralNetwork.NNWorker

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stopps the NeuralNetwork.NNWorker process by setting stoop boolean. Unlocks the controlPanel.
